vote.title: Authorize rescinding Resolution No. 20-0142, previously approved on January 8, 2020, for a twenty-year agreement with one ten-year renewal option and two additional five-year renewal options, with Reverchon Park Sports and Entertainment, LLC for the development, operation, and maintenance of a proposed new athletic field and stadium at Reverchon Park located at 3505 Maple Avenue - Financing: Estimated Revenue Foregone: Reverchon Park Beautification Fund $30,000.00
vote.description: Authorize rescinding Resolution No. 20-0142, previously approved on January 8, 2020, for a twenty-year agreement with one ten-year renewal option and two additional five-year renewal options, with Reverchon Park Sports and Entertainment, LLC for the development, operation, and maintenance of a proposed new athletic field and stadium at Reverchon Park located at 3505 Maple Avenue - Financing: Estimated Revenue Foregone: Reverchon Park Beautification Fund $30,000.00
